author: CTPPS
body:
@dilsonjd

Following up the request from PR #24420 of splliting it into smaller chunks of code. This PR comprises the packages PPSTools (with commons tools used by fast sim, fast reco and full sim), the dedicated proton transport, which incorporates the TOTEM parameterization into the old SimTransport (HECTOR) and finishes the development started in Jan, 2017 and recovers the old simtransport (hector only) as it was before used by ZDC; it also includes the adaptation PPS fastsim to the new transport.
title: Splitting into PPSTools + new transport with totem param. and fastsim
